Stay connected to your WiFi DashCam with our app. The wireless dash cam brings convenience to your fingertips by allowing seamless accessibility through the dash cam with app features such as view, download, speed, location and share your cameras recordings, all from the convenience of your smartphone.

Our Car Dash cams include everything you need for installation, seamlessly blending into your vehicle's interior. Additionally, it comes with a 64GB memory card to ensure that your drive cam records for an extended period without running out of space.

Our car dashcam G-Sensor technology detects sudden impacts, automatically locking the footage. This means you have solid evidence from your dashboard camera for cars in your hands including speed and location, when you need it most.

Broader field of view with the car on-dash mounted cameras wide-angle lens, reducing blind spots. Plus, night vision technology on your dash cam for car ensures your recordings are crystal clear at all times. Compatible most of the vehicles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elevate Your Driving Experience with Autosky 4K DashCam Are you ready to take your driving experience to the next level? Look no further than the Autosky 4K DashCam with built-in Wi-Fi, GPS, and a user-friendly app. This cutting-edge dashcam offers unparalleled features and ensures your safety, security, and peace of mind on the road.

Autosky - The ultimate choice for every driver G-Sensor for Incident Detection: Your car camera detects any sudden impacts or collisions and automatically locks and safeguards the relevant footage to ensure it's not overwritten, with this feature your AutoSky Dash Cam will provide you with crucial evidence in case of an accident. Easy Installation Plug & Play Upgrade your driving experience today with our Ultra HD 4K Dash Cam Wifi. Designed for quick and hassle-free installation. The package includes all necessary accessories, and the intuitive design of our dash cams ensure that you'll be up and running in no time.

Previous page Dashcams for cars High-Quality 4K Ultra HD Recording Crystal-clear video 4K quality, to capture license plates, and details with unmatched precision. Dashcams for cars Night Vision Our dash cam has High-quality technology to capture clear and detailed footage, even at night Dashcams for cars Memory Card Included To simplify your experience, we've included a 64GB memory card ensuring your DashCam is ready to use Dashcams for cars Loop Recording When your memory card is full it automatically overwrites the oldest footage with new recordings. Next page 1 High-Quality 4K 2 Night Vision 3 Memory Card Included 4 Loop Recording

AutoSky Dash Cam Dash Cam WiFi with GPS Tracking feature Our dashcam features built-in WiFi, enabling seamless wireless connection to your smartphone. Access your dash cam footage, download videos, and adjust settings effortlessly through the mobile app. Track your route, view your speed, and pinpoint your location throughout your drive, adding an extra layer of information in case you need it. Get ready to enhance your driving experience and drive secured day and night. Autosky's 4K DashCam is your trusted companion on the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the price, good enough for most folks.
reviews.reviewText: Looking to add an extra layer of security and peace of mind to your journeys? Look no further than this dash cam. Trust me, this little gadget packs a punch when it comes to capturing every moment on the road!Let's start with the picture quality. While it might not rival the more expensive 4K dash cams out there, this one still delivers stunning visuals that bring your drives to life. From the vibrant hues of a sunset cruise to the crisp clarity of license plates, you'll be amazed at the level of detail this camera captures. Sure, it might not be as good as some more expensive options, but for the price, it's more than enough to bear witness to any incidents on the road - and let's face it, that's what most of us are after, right?But it's not just about the visuals. This dash cam brings convenience to a whole new level with its WiFi connectivity and user-friendly app. With just a few taps on your smartphone, you can access, view, download, and even share your camera's recordings with ease. No more fumbling with tiny buttons or struggling to transfer files - it's all right there at your fingertips.Installation is a breeze too. The sleek design seamlessly blends into your vehicle's interior, giving you a professional-looking setup without any hassle. Plus, with the included 64GB memory card, you can rest assured that your dash cam will keep recording for extended periods without worrying about running out of space.Safety is a top priority with this dash cam, thanks to its G-Sensor technology. It automatically detects sudden impacts and locks the footage, ensuring that you have solid evidence at your fingertips in case of any accidents or incidents. And with its wide-angle lens and night vision technology, you can trust that your recordings will be crystal clear, day or night, reducing blind spots and capturing every detail of your journey.So whether you're a daily commuter, a weekend road tripper, or just someone who values their safety on the road, this dash cam is a must-have companion for every journey. Affordable, reliable, and packed with features, it's the perfect way to add an extra layer of protection to your drives. Trust me, once you have it, you'll wonder how you ever drove without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Everything you need in a dash cam !!!
reviews.reviewText: This dash can has most of the features you would be looking for. I found the 4K resolution really allowed me to discern license plates. In addition , this dash cam at least includes a memory card. I do wish it was a higher capacity card as 64 GB is too small in my opinion. That being said, the dash cam does incorporate loop recording so when the card is full it will start overwriting. The upside is that it overwrites the older recordings first.The additional features I liked was the parking monitor which I consider "must have" in a dash cam.This unit also functional well at night. The footage, whilst not perfect, was above average. I found the wifi capabilities to be one of the best things about the dash cam. I was ability to easily connect it to my phone, download recordings, which is exactly what I need to be able to do, if I have to submit video evidence. You also get to see other information, in the app, such as speed, location and other details.Overall, this is a great feature rich dash cam, that was easy to setup and use. The negatives are that It does not record inside the car nor does it record the rear which would be useful if you are read-ended..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The screen is a rectangle which makes it look like you are missing some but you are not, it was easy to apply the sticky given and it held. Camer FPS is smooth and rich, quality is 4K and colorful output. It came with an SD card and works wonderfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I was disappointed
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately I had some issues that I wasn't comfortable with in attempting to use this device. First of all... the camera, mounting bracket, cable, supporting materials & documents seem well put together. Here is where the issues begin. On the side of the box and on page 24 of the instruction manual there is a QR code to scan in order to download the supporting App from either the Apple or Android App stores. When I scanned the QR code on page 24 with my iPhone, I got a message " No Source Found". The scan on the side of the box takes you to a website. Then I typed into the search bar of the Apple App store "AutoSky 4K Dashcam" again nothing was found for a Dashcam. Then I emailed their customer service for assistance. To my surprise, I received a reply in less than a minute advising me the App is called "Vidure" and a link for the App. Normally I don't click on suspicious links but I said what the heck I wanted to use this cool dashcam. I downloaded the Vidure App to my iPhone. After reading the "Privacy Policy" I was again feeling uncomfortable and a little suspicious of the App. It wanted me to grant permission for personal information, (although they won't share) access to all images the camera would capture as well as GPS data. It also wanted me to connect the camera to my home wifi network in order to proceed any further in setting up the camera. Additionally, there was no mention of "AutoSky Dashcam" anywhere that I read in the "Privacy Policy" of the Vidure App agreement. So I immediately removed the App from my iPhone and as a result I am unable to use and experience this Dashcam. Now... AutoSky if I am mistaken in my review, please correct me. I would like to use your Dashcam. AMAZON... you may want to look into this product a little further for authenticity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent 4K dash cam with SD card included
reviews.reviewText: The installation process was straightforward and the kit comes with windshield protector as well. The cable is long and I was able to route and tuck it neatly alongside the windshield and down through the passenger seat and to the 12V lighter port. I would recommend testing out the view of the camera before attaching it to the windshield. The image resolution is fine during day and night. 64GB SD Card is enough if you don't need to review footage more than a week. Overall, this dash cam is compact and the setting up was a breeze.
